title: Part A - Claim
stimulusHtml:
1 Point

  • IMM maintains a proton gradient required for ATP synthesis.

  • Electron transport chain is in IMM and creates a proton gradient

  • Electron transport chain is in IMM and leads to ATP synthesis

  • IMM is the site for ATP synthesis
descriptions:
Student earns none of the following points.

1 Point

  • IMM maintains a proton gradient required for ATP synthesis.

  • Electron transport chain is in IMM and creates a proton gradient

  • Electron transport chain is in IMM and leads to ATP synthesis

  • IMM is the site for ATP synthesis

Student earns one of the following points.

1 Point

  • IMM maintains a proton gradient required for ATP synthesis.

  • Electron transport chain is in IMM and creates a proton gradient

  • Electron transport chain is in IMM and leads to ATP synthesis

  • IMM is the site for ATP synthesis
